name: Installing a PocketMine/MCPE Server on CentOS 7 (Linux)
tagline: A Tutorial on which to know how to install a MCPE/PocketMine Server
body:
#Welcome to the Official Site of Installing a PocketMine/MCPE Server on CentOS 7 :D

>**Please Note:** __All commands must be entered on SSH or the installation will NEVER work.__

##To start installing please go to "[Installing PocketMine](https://github.com/CaptainDuck/How-to-install-a-MCPE-PocketMine-server-on-CentOS-7-Linux/wiki/Installing-PocketMine)" Page.

##To open a port on a CentOS, Please go to "[Openning a Port](https://github.com/CaptainDuck/How-to-install-a-MCPE-PocketMine-server-on-CentOS-7-Linux/wiki/Openning-a-Port)" Page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
